title: My account got deleted
body: Okey, hello. I have two league of legends account, or, o have had two league of legends account. My main accounts name was "---" with the ingame name "bjornerockz". It is now gone. And if i try to log in with it i only get directed to try a different region. So i tried the europe east (my main is on west) and i got in, like, wtf. But it was a level 1 account with the summoner name "pentakillinc" i think. pffff.. anyways... looks like my main account got deleted for no reason.

replies.body: I've snipped out your account name for privacy and security.  We'd like to help with your issue, and see what's going on with your account!  Reach out to us in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so our account team can help with recovery.  It may take a bit depending on the size of the queue, but we will respond as soon as we can.  You'll be in good hands!
